# unifi_user_group (Resource)

Manages a UniFi user group (bandwidth profile).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "unifi_user_group" "guest_limit" {
  name           = "Guest Limits"
  download_limit = 5000 # Kbps (5 Mbps)
  upload_limit   = 1000 # Kbps (1 Mbps)
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the user group.

### Optional

- `download_limit` (Number) The download limit in Kbps.
- `upload_limit` (Number) The upload limit in Kbps.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the user group.
